name: Deep Space (itch) (KitsuneCafe, Skubasteve)
description:
You're adrift in space on a badly damaged ship. Avoid running out of oxygen, being pulled into space, or dying to various hazards in order to get your ship running again.

Controls

  • Walk: W or S to move forward or backward
  • Look: Mouse
  • Interact: E

UI

  • The bar next to the player represents their suit oxygen
  • The bar on the bottom right represents the ship's oxygen
  • The red bar at the center bottom is the player's health
  • The green pips on the bottom left represent the ship's energy

known issues

  • Jumping back into the ship from a hull breach can softlock the game
  • The ship's energy doesn't always accurately display when energy is being used (for example, when using the medbay or refilling oxygen)

Wonderful art by Skubasteve

Fantastic sound and music by Koko

Broken, unplayable code by KitsuneCafe
